title: The Townhouse Brewpub & Eatery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers vegetarian items of which some made be made vegan by omitting cheese. Vegans could get the black bean burrito bowl, curry dish, salad, chocolate tart. Thursday night live Jazz from 9pm. Sunday evening Irish music session from 6:30pm.
